name: Card Souls
description:
Card Souls is a Souls-Like Combat, Real-Time Card Game Game.

(This is only one fight Demo covering all the core mechanics of the game)

Souls-Like Combat where you have to Dodge enemy attacks while delivering your own and even more when completing Combos to hit even harder.

plus the game features an Effective 3 charges Estus to recover your health, it's yummy!!

Real-Time Card Game where all your actions are controlled by cards but you don't have turns or time to think, it's nonstop action. You can play and discard cards.

Future updates:

- More Cards combinations

[Hammer Card = Stun Enemy]

[Spear Card = Damage Enemy and Slide one to side]

[Shield Wall Card = Gives two Shields]

- More Enemies and more enemy actions

- Full Equipment System where pieces of equipment will influence your cards (Deck-Building)

- Level System where you'll move from an enemy to another. (Map)

Thanks for playing the Demo.

What do you think of this idea? should I keep developing it?

I would love your feedback as the development of this game depends on it. (Check Community Page)
